name: Fragments (itch) (starandsnow)
description:
A short Point & Click narrative game. Delve through the wreckage of a house and the memories of an unreliable narrator.

Developed for the 2022 LÖVE Jam. https://itch.io/jam/love2d-jam-2022

For anyone curious, the source code is available at https://github.com/CatsAreEvil/2022-Love2D-GameJam
